posts.text:
Til sölu 2 ára gamalt Panasonic 42" lcd tæki. Hefur hangið á vegg frá upphafi.
Borðstandurinn fylgir með. (en ekki veggfesting) Fjarstýring ónotuð.
Allt mjög vel farið og virkilega flott tæki.
Vill fá 80-85 þús fyrir það.
Get jafnvel skoðað skipti á eitthverju. 
Hér er specs um sjónvarpið
General
 Diagonal size 42.0 in .
 Viewing angle 178 degrees .
 Viewing angle (vertical) 178 degrees .
 Color Piano black .
 
Video
 Technology TFT active matrix .
 LCD display technology IPS .
 Resolution 1920 x 1080 .
 Display format 1080p .
 Image aspect ratio 16:9 .
 Progressive Scan Progressive scanning (line doubling) .
 Widescreen Widescreen .
 Widescreen modes 16:9,
 Zoom,
 Auto Wide,
 Zoom 14:9,
 Conventional 4:3 .
 Dynamic contrast ratio 50000:1 .
 Comb filter 3D digital .
 HDCP compatible Yes .
 Supported DTV resolutions 720/60p,
 720/50p,
 1080/50p,
 1080/24p,
 1080/50i,
 480/60p,
 1080/60p,
 1080/60i,
 576/50i .
 
TV Tuner
 TV tuner presence Yes .
 Digital TV tuner DVB-T .
 Analog TV tuner PAL,
 SECAM .
 TV tuner reception system PAL-D,
 SECAM-B,
 PAL-G,
 SECAM-K,
 SECAM-D,
 PAL-H,
 SECAM-L,
 PAL-I,
 PAL-K,
 SECAM-G,
 PAL-B .
 
Audio
 Analog video input signals PAL60 .
 Surround mode Yes .
 Sound effects V-AUDIO Surround Sound .
 Audio controls Bass,
 Balance .
 
Convenience Features
 Additional features 3D Color Management,
 Q-link,
 Video noise reduction,
 V-REAL PRO 3,
 VIERA Link,
 Parental control .
 
Connectivity
 Video interface HDMI,
 Composite,
 Component,
 SCART,
 S-Video .
 HDMI ports qty 3.0 .
 PC interface VGA (HD-15) .
 
Remote Control
 Type Remote control .
 
Power
 Power device Power supply - Internal .
 Power device nominal voltage AC 230 V .
 Power consumption stand by / sleep 0.45 Watt .
 
Dimensions & Weight
 Dimensions (WxDxH) 40.2 in x 12.2 in x 26.7 in - With stand .
 Weight 46.3 lbs
